General.Name: Saraswati Griya Lestari Tbk
General.Description: PT. Saraswati Griya Lestari Tbk operates in the field of hospitality in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Hotel and Property. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT. Saraswati Griya Lestari Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Tiara Realty.
General.Address: The Bellezza Shopping Arcade, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12210
